page.title: 20 Summary and Credits
page.content: There is a distinct division of our area into the U.S.A.F.Base at R.A.F. Mildenhall in the South and the local villages and farms in the North.No such division exists between the two communities.Our American visitors are welcomed and they contribute much to our society,not only in terms of co-operation and cultural exchanges but also in employment for local residents and many long lasting friendships between families. This happy relationship has been confirmed during our researches for the Domesday Project and we are very grateful to the R.A.F. and U.S.A.F.Commanders,the Base Historian,Officers,civilians and families of R.A.F.Mildenhall.Our thanks also for the help and welcome we have received from local residents, and to the 1985 Fifth Year children and their parents who have collected information.
